name: Meatball vs Snowball
description:
Earthling cats are tired of humans doing stupid things, they summon the intergalactic feline heroes to save them. Meatball has a chance now to be the hero and savior of earthly cats and starts the journey down to earth. But this is also Snowball's chance to come back for the catnip which Meatball stole from him a few galactic cat-years ago.

Who's going to be the meowed hero of the earthly cats and who'll go back to the depths of space awaiting reprisal! Find out now.

Gameplay:
Stay within the screen limits to survive while trying to throw the other player out.
Avoid incoming obstacles.
Catch incoming obstacles by going very close and throw back at the opponent.

Controls:
Player1 :
WASD - Movement
Left Shift or Spacebar - Catch and Shoot

Player2:
Arrow keys - Movement
Right Shift or Num 0 - Catch and Shoot

Dev Team
